title: ANyone else finding games they weren't in recently?
body: There is one game on my profile i wasn't in That apparently i didn't play. 30 min later i play ranked with my friend. we create a lobby. We start the que and then he has a ban timer. He had 2 games he didn't play apparently either. Anybody else getting these problems? The didn't play means was in the game but didn't participate. Disconnected or something whole game. On mine there was no items bought on the game i was apparently in.

replies.body: That sounds really weird, the only thing I can think of is the potential of unauthorized users on the account.  I highly recommend he goes through our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide and update  passwords/info asap!  If he has any questions or concerns, have him reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
